attributes.review: Worst app ever. Don’t waste your time. This app is as dry as his personality, and as informative. It has cookies, and takes up un essay space.

attributes.review: i am writing this from the gates of heaven. i launched the app in hopes of learning more about the bunker boy 2020 campaign but instead bunkerboy reached through my screen and held me in a chokehold. 💔 would not recommend.

attributes.review: The day after I downloaded this app, Donald a Trump HIMSELF showed up at my front door and started screaming racial slurs at me... I’m WHITE!
